Package sample

Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
sample.Schedule
public class Schedule extends Object
Schedule is the hub of all Lists and Methods used to make this program work.

    • typeTotal

      public static void typeTotal()
      get Distinct types from app table using stream distinct and collecting with. Lambdas are used to save tiem and code by not having to write methods to do the same task.

    • monthTotal

      public static void monthTotal()
      streaming the data from appTable I use map with a lamdas to get the month and find the distinct months. Lamdas are used in place of methods to help speed up the process and write less code that is easier to read.
